segments.text: I can't take my eyes off the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps running, forming a continuous sheet over the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's already created a significant puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel quite disgusted by the thought of so much wasted water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the water damage to those cabinets and the wooden floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in it, oblivious to the rising tide around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is completely submerged, and she continues drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just baffling how anyone could be so completely distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This negligence is truly upsetting; it's going to be a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the homeowner has good insurance for this kind of accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden visible through the window makes the internal chaos even more pronounced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is just a testament to how quickly things can go wrong unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really wish I could reach in and turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water is alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR
